category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_variant_configurator_relationship
preference.preference_description: Specifies the relationship between an Application Model (for example, a Collaborative Design) and the related Item when using a variant configurator such as the Product Configurator. Valid Values: The name of any valid relation between an Application Model and an Item Revision that represents a Variant Configurator context.
